captions.text: I think they will stand out so...
because of that bright and energetic feeling you get from these boots.
I think they have captured my bold and cheerful nature.
Something with a bit of bling to give you
that little bit extra to stand out from the crowd.
The tattoo I've got... that was done with my sister.
We thought we'd get one done together
And the feelings I have for my sister are rare.
And so that is why we decided to pay each other homage in that way.
I've always got something with diamonds on me.
I think it is a great honor for me to be able to wear a nike product.
and to be the only player to wear those boots.
I hope they bring me luck and allow me to score a lot of goals.
